content: quick slip cowl by andra asars chase the winter chill with this reversible cowl knit in linen stitch this cowl is wicked quick using large needles and one skein of multi colored sparkly wool finished measurements 34 circumference 6 5 height materials berroco brio 1 skein 9422 verve us#15 circular needle 24 long stitch marker gauge 3 sts/in and 7 row = 1 in slip_stitch pattern abbreviations pm= place marker wyif= with yarn in front sl1= slip one stitch as if to purl slip_stitch pattern worked in the round on odd number round 1 *k1 wyif sl1* repeat * to * to end of round round 2 *wyif sl1 k1* repeat * to * to end of round knitting cast on 101 sts join round being careful to not twist pm work in slip_stitch pattern repeating the two rounds until about two yards of yarn remain bind off in pattern
